content: Sunday is The Lord's day. Let us find time to be with him. Worship is so much more than the songs that we sing on sunday morning. It is the life that we live the rest of the week.The worship of Jesus Christ is our joy and privilege today. And tomorrow and next sunday, and for all eternity.
name: Faith Baptist Church, Sunday 11AM

content: In our prayers, we talk to God, in our Bible study, God talks to us, and we had better let God do most of the talking. Bible study is the most essential ingredient in the believer's spiritual life, because it is only in study of the Bible, as that is the blessed by the Holy Spirit that christians hear Christ and discover what it means to follow him.It is essential for spiritual maturity.
name: Faith Baptist Church, Friday 06:30PM

content: At the heart of every revival is the spirit of prayer.Will you not revive us again. That your people may rejoice in you.Open the Heavens, O Lord pour out your Spirit
name: Faith Baptist Church, Saturday 11:00AM
